values.value: Payment Solutions for Banks, NBFCs, Insurance Companies;Managed Transformation Office solution;PMO Services;System Audits, Cyber Audits, Compliance Audits, SecOps;QA for GRC functions;ECL Modelling;Gold Standard Audit for NBFC;RPT Governance Solution;GIFT City set-ups;GRC Transformation Solutions - Integrated GRC Technology;Early fraud/financial misconduct warning signals for lending institutions;Private Equity deal structuring;Actuarial Model Validation and Model Governance;IFRS 17 advisory;BeSpoke;Expertise
